mapper.insert: insert into food(food_id, food_name, food_price, description, is_recommend, seller_id, is_delete) values(#{foodInfoDTO.foodId}, #{foodInfoDTO.foodName}, #{foodInfoDTO.foodPrice}, #{foodInfoDTO.description}, #{foodInfoDTO.isRecommend}, #{foodInfoDTO.sellerId}, 0)
mapper.select: select f.food_id as foodId, f.food_name as foodName, f.food_price as foodPrice, f.description, f.is_recommend as isRecommend, f.today_sell as todaySell from food f where f.seller_id = #{sellerId} and f.is_delete = 0 limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from food f where f.seller_id = #{sellerId} and f.is_delete = 0
select count(food_name) from food where seller_id = #{sellerId} and food_name = #{foodName}
